title: Front End Developer internship
content: I am currently interning at a software factory or software house company in Bandung, namely the Sahaware Company.

title: Looking for projects
content: I still receive projects regarding the digital sector, especially on websites, I have a team for this too.

title: I am ready for the team
content: I can also be hired as a team member on a particular project, I can use my skills in using Git and GitHub.

title: Still Learning
content: I still to learn and still to look for the most updated technology and frameworks in the field of web development
